markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Social Camouflage](/Feats.aspx?ID=4023) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 61</row>

</column>

---

You have the uncanny ability to quickly blend into the lifestyle of whatever settlement in which you find yourself. After residing in a particular settlement for at least 1 day, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) to pass yourself off as a resident of that settlement. Additionally, you can use [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) in place of [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) while in that settlement. The GM might decide you need more time in particularly large settlements to gain these benefits, or might decide you gain the benefits only while in a specific district or part of the settlement.
name: Social Camouflage
